website_summaries.verdict: Uniquely designed chilling stones with a flat profile come in an elegant storage tray.
pros: The round granite-made stones are FDA-safe, look beautiful on display or in a glass, and come with an attractive storage tray
They chill as they're supposed to and are very easy to clean
cons: The small size means you'll need to use more than two to effectively chill your drink

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Made for a great gift. Keeps drinks cold. Very durable, one was accidentally dropped on a tile floor from 4 ft and it didnt break!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Baumgartner

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Wipe down wood and stones before use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband as a stocking stuffer and he loves them. The wood piece they come in needs to be wiped down well before use as it had stain coming off of it and we didn’t want that on the stones. Once cleaned it was wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hite

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These came in the nick of time. We had an issue with our plumbing and could no use any water for 3 days. We had to throw out all of our ice cubes and buy bottled/jugs of water. Did not have to buy any ice, these were perfect for any drink. Not only are they great for an emergency, they look upscale and would be perfect for parties.
customer_reviews.author: Auggie

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my dad for christmas. They are exactly as pictured and the wood peice is nice and the stones themselves are nice. But he ended up giving these back to me because he said they didnt work. I was shocked and midly upset. Until i tried them for myself and they barely even made my drink cold. I at first thought he didnt leave them in the freezer long enough but nope they just dont really make your drink cold. I wouldnt buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Micayla Groover

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, high quality stones!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous stones! Nice weight, high quality & beautifully presented. Look rather expensive for the price!
customer_reviews.author: SherryDahling

customer_reviews.title: Good💩👍
customer_reviews.text: Love that it doesn't melt & ruin the liquor. Such a good tool for drinking, except when u tilt back too fast & it slaps you in the lip or nose.😄
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Coffman

customer_reviews.title: The stones are very pretty and a nice upgrade from the square little whiskey ...
customer_reviews.text: The stones are very pretty and a nice upgrade from the square little whiskey rocks. They were smaller in size than I expected, but that's completely on me, as I did not look at the dimensions when purchasing. Easily solved by using two!
customer_reviews.author: Jami Wallis

customer_reviews.title: A very nice-looking gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these first for our Secret Santa gift exchange at work. My colleague and friend really liked them. So did I. The natural stones look fantastic, also they are smooth to the touch, and the wooden case/display adds a lot, so in overall the set looks very decent. So, eventually, I ordered a second set for my boyfriend, and he was delighted. Good product! I highly recommend these stones.
customer_reviews.author: Maria P

customer_reviews.title: Great value and a classy gift
customer_reviews.text: I was recently introduced to the concept of whiskey stones and thought I give them a try. These stones come in multiple ‘colors’ that match and give character to the whiskey you are sampling. They come with a nice tray that is just classy. Stones allow you to chill you favorite adult beverage without diluting it with water from melted water. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Adams

customer_reviews.title: Not Chill
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these chilling stones as a present for my dad on father's day. After placing them in the freezer for a couple of days we wanted to try them out. I'm not sure how it's possible but they were not even cold to the touch, and definitely did not chill the whiskey we placed them in. Very disappointed in this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Shores

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend for his birthday. He loves them! The short cylindrical stones look much more classy than the cubes. They come with a nice wooden tray to keep them in. He stores them in the freezer for use anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Harkleroad

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: They do not stay cold for longer than a few seconds, making them useless. I got them as a gift for my boyfriend, who likes his whiskey chilled but not watered down. The rocks were frozen for an entire week before use, and did not even chill a small shot of whiskey before getting warm again.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Ruliffson

customer_reviews.title: Bought as birthday gift & he loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about the bleeding of colors because like I said, I gave them as birthday gift. So far from what I know he does use them so I hope he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Very classy stones
customer_reviews.text: I am super happy with these stones! They are the perfect size for any glass and you only need one to keep your drink cold the whole time you're drinking it. The board you place them on is very durable and super sleek. They would make a perfect gift if I didnt want to keep them for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and useful
customer_reviews.text: Not only are these stones useful to keep your drink cold without watering it down, but they are very attractive, too! They come in a nice wooden holder that keeps the stones safe in your freezer. A great gift but also a wonderful purchase for your own use!
customer_reviews.author: S. Leapman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect husband gift!
customer_reviews.text: When these arrived I couldn't wait to give them to my husband for his birthday! After an hour in the freezer they were ready to use. The presentation of the wood tray makes them a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Solid Whiskey Rocks
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid product. The design is sleek and it really makes the fine tuning of your drink easy to do. No more over melted ice. Helps to keep the dilution level just the way I like it. If you're not a super whiskey fan, it's also just a great thing to have in your place. Adds some cool decor and vibe to the mini bar you could be building. Great gift for your dad or anyone that really likes whiskey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: really like this product
customer_reviews.text: Sweet gift for my husband that he really liked. Well made products and nice that the stones have two different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Katarina

customer_reviews.title: The greatest invention since sliced bread!!! Really!!!
customer_reviews.text: These stones are perfect for drinking scotch, whiskey or any of your favorite drinks without the watering down of ice!!!! I WILL NEVER USE ICE AGIAN!!!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Prakoth

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased
customer_reviews.text: Great items, keep them in the freezer until ready to use, retrieve and get cold whiskey, or other drinks, without the dilution that comes with ice. I really like the variety of colors of granite. Keeps it interesting, and can mix and match with the color of the drink. Also, an interesting conversation starter with friends. Definitely going to buy these along with other whiskey glasses for my friend’s 21st.
customer_reviews.author: Eli M.

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I first heard about whiskey chilling stones from a co-worker and thought I'd give it a try. She claims to have paid an arm and a leg for a different brand of stones that she purchased years ago. I've totally got her beat! Not only are these so much prettier than hers but just a single stone keeps my drink nice and cold. These were also very affordable and that means I can buy more as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: GnuttabC

customer_reviews.title: My dad loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for my whiskey loving dad, he couldn't wait to sip on some Woodford Reserve or Slain with these... nice quality for a great price. a solid gift for your loved ones who love quality whiskey!
customer_reviews.author: Braxton L.

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I struggle with gifting for each other - these are unique and he loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Walters

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful gift for ANY occasion!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried the stones would be too large to fit in our glasses but they are the perfect little size to fit a normal scotch glass! They are absolutely beautiful in the different shades of granite. We set the wooden dish right in our freezer and it barely takes up any space!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why but when my husband poured his whiskey the stones were fizzing and made the whiskey bubbly. I don’t drink but he said it made the whiskey taste terrible and he dumped it out. The wooden block the stones come in is terribly stained. I rubbed my finger on it and it all came off. It was just cheap and not what I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: They don’t keep the whiskey cold even with 2 stones. They are just ok. They come nice and packages and it’s a cool display but doesn’t actually work
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Bentivegna

customer_reviews.title: Less Ice
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as gift for my husband. He has enjoyed them so much that he said I should get another set for our camper. So he can have one at home and one for on the go! He uses less ice in his drink now.
customer_reviews.author: O.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a gift. They looked great and the storage box looked awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Marketta

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my dad for Christmas and he loved them. They are sturdy and look fancy. Definitely worth the money. The also work well and cool the drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Noris M. Frades

customer_reviews.title: Attractive whiskey rocks
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, colorful assortment of granite whiskey rocks with wooden tray. These are larger than the usual square whiskey rocks, which is perfect for me. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyLA

customer_reviews.title: Unique and Professional
customer_reviews.text: I AM so pleased with how these turned out! I love how unique they are and the tray they come with. Each set is different! The packaging is very professional and came in less than a week!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: A no brainer buy!
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift and I know they will be a huge hit! Great packaging and nice quality. Def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: B.C.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I have been watching whiskey reviews on YouTube. Saw a review where they where using stainless steel cubes. Did my own research and decided to go with R.O.C.K.S. Glad I did. The different patterns and colors look really nice and the stones hold their temperature for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: They just don't work
customer_reviews.text: I rarely feel compelled to leave reviews, I bought these due to the positive reviews and they just don't work at all. I tried multiple stones in multiple drinks and the drinks never noticeably chilled. Returned for a refund and ordered the 2.5" ice ball molds.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Cahoon

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: I have use these a few times. The work ok. I just noticed that one of the stones have developed a viable crack.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Allessi

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and makes any drink on the rocks look cooler!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for a whiskey lover! My guy said it made his whiskey more flavorful and it just looked super cool. I would just say they are smaller than expected but still very classic looking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them as a birthday gift for my fiance. We followed all of the directions and placed them directly in the freezer. He had a drink with them in there and the did not make the drink any colder than it already was. Presentation of them is great, functionality is very subpar.
customer_reviews.author: Carley N

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived damaged; no fault of the seller but it was disappointing because of how I planned to gift this. That aside, product looks and feels like good quality. Receiver was thrilled w: them.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the whiskey lover.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Was bought for my son as a Christmas gift. He loved them.
customer_reviews.author: G. Mohr

customer_reviews.title: The packaging was rugged and classy.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was rugged and classy. Beautiful stones and wooden holder. The only problem we have is that it doesn't exactly add any chill to your drink. I would say these are more for keeping an already chilled drink cool and for looks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Looks good... Made for a great gift to whiskey loving friends
customer_reviews.author: Juhi Ranjan

customer_reviews.title: They are a little smaller than we thought but they chill pretty well and are much nicer than using ice
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves his new whiskey stones. They are a little smaller than we thought but they chill pretty well and are much nicer than using ice.
customer_reviews.author: Laura VG

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to go along with a whiskey glass set, stones looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Very durable but takes all stones to make a drink
customer_reviews.author: Mendy

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: They do not seem to work very well. Gave them to my boss and when asked how they were he shrugged and said “They are alright” and kept walking. Big disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Penny Abood

customer_reviews.title: As expected. Have only used with Bourbon.
customer_reviews.text: Does what was expected. Chilled not cold. Owner is very involved with customers.
customer_reviews.author: Rjh

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than expected, but other than that were nice.
customer_reviews.author: TY

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: great gift idea and does what it is sold to do. i just wish it would last abit longer.
customer_reviews.author: john m todd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: Awesome rocks! I purchased for my dad who loves whiskey. He immediately washed and put them In the freezer he used them Today and loves thin. The packaging is cute and they look cute sitting on a bar cart
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: They were left outside in the cold for about an hour and held that temperature for quite a while I didn't time it but I was already impressed and I am very ready to not have watered down drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Elana Bakeman

customer_reviews.title: Pinkys out
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my whisky connoisseur brother and they didn’t disappoint. He loves the concept of chilling his whiskey while not diluting the drink with melting ice. I’ll definitely buy another set for our father!!
customer_reviews.author: Rian W

customer_reviews.title: Great chilling stones!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! The look and work great. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen M. Barr

customer_reviews.title: Do it!! :)
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé ordered these and loves them! Easy to use, clean and store. Great gift if you’re thinking about it. Very pleased. Seller even emailed us a thank you for purchase and sent us 10 drink recipes we can make to enjoy these!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ziemba

customer_reviews.title: These rocks rock!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Love the colors, how smooth they are, cute holder, easy to put in freezer!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Get Your Rocks ON!
customer_reviews.text: Love these ROCKS! If you don’t like your drinks to get watered down by ice, you’re going to love these ROCKS! 2 or 3 and your Manhattan or Jameson will chill a lot longer than ICE!
customer_reviews.author: John Farley

customer_reviews.title: Don't keep drinks cold
customer_reviews.text: These things are beautiful and I really wanted to like them but they just don't really do much to cool drinks despite several days in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Monas

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my boyfriend and he absolutely loves them. I had no idea these were a thing until I went searching for a gift for him. He loves them, very gentlemanly.
customer_reviews.author: Tai Mason

customer_reviews.title: Dirty
customer_reviews.text: The stand was so dirty I wiped it down and the paper towel was black. It was disgusting. There are also scratches all over the stones and looks like it’s going to crack.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my husband, and he loves them. He prefers a mixed drink, so he usually puts all six rocks in to keep his larger drink cold ~ works great without watering it down!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Well, they’re rocks. And they behave as such. They neither keep or make anything cold. They’re pretty. And utterly useless. Bought for myself and a friend. We both trashed them. Oh, and good luck not chipping a tooth.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: One cracked the first time I froze it. They ...
customer_reviews.text: One cracked the first time I froze it. They do not make drinks cold at all unless you put in all six. Not worth paying the extra money to get the "nicer" stones.
customer_reviews.author: Kaari

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Small so they don't take up freezer room and practical because we don't keep our bottles in the fridge!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Sherman Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit smaller than I expected but they are perfect! Each one is different which will make remembering which glass is yours easy. They are a perfect gift for anyone who likes cold drinks. Great price too, will probably order again.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle W.

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors
customer_reviews.text: The stones are beautiful, just wish they were a bit bigger, have to use more than one to keep drink cold.
customer_reviews.author: Nomi

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel great! Keeps drinks cool.
customer_reviews.text: These look and feel super classy! No stone cools as quickly as ice but they get the job done for me. It's a fine tradeoff considering my drink doesn't get diluted at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than what i thought it would but overall great gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: melany

customer_reviews.title: Very Excited!
customer_reviews.text: Very excited to use this product! I washed and boiled the stones and am now letting them dry overnight as the instructions on the box said.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Wooden

customer_reviews.title: About what you expect.
customer_reviews.text: These are high-quality whiskey stones that I would generally recommend gifting to anyone who is interested in whiskey.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Kent

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We very much love these chilling rocks. They are absolutely beautiful and work very well.
customer_reviews.author: JennB

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Brought for my husband and he loved them! You need about two stone for a larger glass. Nice design and craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: terri g.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to fit 1 stone in a drink glass or add more if desired. We love these!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jennen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift and they worked perfect for whiskey cocktails! Kept the drinks cold and not watered down!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a wedding gift for the groom. High quality! Very heavy, nice wooden holder. Excited to gift these and order myself a set!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler C

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: It was a great gift for my husband and father in law!! And the company sent me whiskey recipes! Which was fun to try!
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: very small and too small - did not chill as well as ice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rocks
customer_reviews.text: The rocks work well. They keep your drink cool without the water down taste of ice.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Szyska

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for men!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a supervisor gift...he loved them said they were amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda M.

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loved them
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift. Husband enjoys them- great for bourbon!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my dad for Christmas and he loved it! Super durable
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Should've read the dimensions before buying... I thought these would be much larger (like 1 to fit in each glass). They're small just like the cheaper, less pretty rocks and they don't come with a bag to put in freezer. (Pretty to display but not practical to store in bottom loading freezer). Husband still loved them and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Cool stones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent chill for the non watered down taste and reusable.
customer_reviews.author: ALP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Whiskey Rocks
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend. She loved them, they look great and work even better.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Gash

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I bought these as a present for my husband, and he really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great Present
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my boyfriend for an early Christmas present and he loved them !
customer_reviews.author: Clairetrotter

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: These work wonderfully to chill but not dilute fone spirits!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: The box they come in is visually appealing, and makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt water down!
customer_reviews.text: These whiskey stones are awesome for a drink on the rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela Schmunk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Exactly what I was looking g for. My husband will just love these! I also love how they are rounded, adds a sleek look to the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend loved them.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i was looking for! My boyfriend loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: Lived my new whiskey stones. Smooth, perfect sized and chilled quickly.
customer_reviews.author: b19957

customer_reviews.title: These rocks are a great way to keep your drinks cool
customer_reviews.text: These rocks are a great way to keep your drinks cool. It doesn't water them down and stays cold for a decent amount of time! Way better than ice!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmina

customer_reviews.title: Cold and look good. Currently sipping on a good whiskey and they're ...
customer_reviews.text: On time and as described. Cold and look good. Currently sipping on a good whiskey and they're working fine.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Richardson

customer_reviews.title: I read reviews of the product ahead of time and ...
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews of the product ahead of time and saw that one person had issues with the finish from the wood transferring to the stones. I also had this issue, and will have to seal the wood, but otherwise the stones work as well as I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas Gift?
customer_reviews.text: I like how the rocks look, and I'm hoping the person I bought them for will like them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M. Krupa

customer_reviews.title: Cute Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my brother in law for Christmas a couple of years ago, he likes quirky little gifts like that. It was a nice gift, and he definitely uses them. They were smaller than I thought they would be, the pictures make them look a little bigger, but that kind of makes sense that they would be small-ish because of being put inside a glass. All in all, I thought it was a great buy, and I'd definitely consider these as a gift for any friends that enjoyed whiskey or the like.
customer_reviews.author: J. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Yay for chilling stones!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a Christmas gift for my boss who is a Scotch aficionado. He seemed to appreciate them and didn't have any of his own yet. I liked the aesthetic of them - the set includes varying tones. The set itself is very lovely and comes in a custom wooden case with instructions. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Travelsinheels

customer_reviews.title: Physics does not add up!
customer_reviews.text: Other than for novelty purposes, and as an ice breaker (pun intended!) at a party, these stones are of no use! They don’t chill, they don’t keep the already cold whiskey cold.. absolutely no use other than for decorative purposes.. ice’s heat capacity is 2000J.K/kg whereas stone’s heat capacity is 1000J.K/kg so one would need a stone twice the size of ice cubes to chill (absorb heat) equally.. so these stones are a scam from a physics loon of view..
customer_reviews.author: Achal

customer_reviews.title: Made of granite! Not soapstone.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my boyfriend who is an avid scotch drinker. I love that these are made of granite, not of soapstone, the edges are rounded and will not scratch the inside of a nice glass. The wood tray is an awesome touch and puts this in the 'high end' quality for a rock set. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: They add a classic, high-end touch ... a no dilution solution.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set of R.O.C.K.S. for my adult son as a gift. They arrived quickly and in perfect condition. The individual stones are an impressive size, larger than a set of cubes I purchased for myself. The style has a quality look both in the box and in the glass. They add a classic, high-end touch to a manly old-fashioned glass. They are a no dilution solution.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Holstein

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Stones are a perfect gift! Got for a friend and he really enjoys them. Keeps bouton chilled with no watering down from ice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Whiskey Chilling Stones - Set of 6 Handcrafted Premium Granite Round Sipping Rocks - Hardwood Presentation & Storage Tray - Perfect Gift by R.O.C.K.S.
feature_bullets: ✔️𝗧𝗛𝗘 𝗖𝗢𝗡𝗡𝗢𝗜𝗦𝗦𝗘𝗨𝗥'𝗦 𝗖𝗛𝗢𝗜𝗖𝗘 - Set includes 6 x Handcrafted premium FDA safe compliant granite round whiskey chilling stones (1.37" diameter and 0.78" thickness), 1 x hardwood presentation and storage tray. Trust an awarded leading brand.

✔️𝗛𝗜𝗚𝗛𝗟𝗬 𝗘𝗙𝗙𝗜𝗖𝗜𝗘𝗡𝗧 - Fast-cooling non-diluting round solid granite stones used to perfectly cool fine spirits without watering down your drink. The round edges will avoid scratching your glass unlike square shaped stones.
✔️𝗘𝗡𝗛𝗔𝗡𝗖𝗘 𝗗𝗥𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗜𝗡𝗚 𝗘𝗫𝗣𝗘𝗥𝗜𝗘𝗡𝗖𝗘 - Our solid rocks let you appreciate and rediscover 𝒐𝒓𝒊𝒈𝒊𝒏𝒂𝒍 𝒕𝒓𝒖𝒆 𝒔𝒑𝒊𝒓𝒊𝒕𝒔 𝒇𝒍𝒂𝒗𝒐𝒓𝒔. Easy to use and wash, our sipping stones are perfectly suited for beverages too!
